item.title: How to manage projexts, the *NIX way!
item.description: Rofi menu: Listing all active projects Finished skills VIM Tailing VM (bspwm) LATEX Containers NixOS & NixShell ROS2.0 Unreal Engine Home Assistant Introduction This tutorial will show you how to create a simple theme in Hugo. I assume that you are familiar with HTML, the bash command line, and that you are comfortable using Markdown to format content.
